home.title: PDF.ai
home.meta_description: PDF.ai offers intelligent document processing tools to help you analyze, rotate, and transform PDF files with ease and efficiency.

rotate.title: Rotate PDF Pages
rotate.description: Just click on the page to rotate it. Then, you can download the modified PDF.
rotate.dropzone: Click to upload or drag and drop
rotate.meta_description: Rotate PDF pages online for free with PDF.ai. Easily adjust page orientation and save your modified document instantly.

pricing.meta_description: Explore our affordable pricing plans for PDF.ai tools. Choose the right plan for your document processing needs, from individual users to enterprises.

get_started.meta_description: Start using PDF.ai's powerful document tools today. Learn how to process, analyze, and transform your PDFs with our easy-to-use platform.

api_hub.meta_description: Access PDF.ai's powerful document processing APIs. Integrate PDF tools into your applications with our developer-friendly API documentation.

use_cases.meta_description: Discover how PDF.ai can solve your document processing challenges. Explore real-world applications for our powerful PDF tools.

chrome_extension.meta_description: Process PDFs directly in your browser with our Chrome extension. Easily rotate, annotate, and extract information from PDF documents.
